content.rendered:
Corekees trees are planted on ‘marginal soil’. This is land that is not agriculturally viable. This type of land is therefore often used for animal husbandry; cows and sheep. 🐄🌳

Corekees’ trees do not stand in the way of growing food. 🥕🌱
